name: Fashion Body Art - Baby Face
description: Fashion Face Art is a fun game which is specially designed for babies and little children. Night is getting closer and everything must be in perfect order. beauty got a wonderful idea how to make her mask to look much better. beauty wants to do a Face Art, but now she can't decided which mask to do. Would you like to help beauty to make the right choice? Select one of the five available Face Art masks and draw it on beauty's Face. Have lots and lots fun playing Face Art game.
